---
name: Admin Features
about: Track implementation of admin features for extracurricular activities platform
labels: enhancement
---

## Features
- Admin login
- Event management
- Registration management

### Description
Implement and improve admin capabilities for managing activities, events, and student registrations.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Admins can securely log in
- Admins can add, edit, and remove events
- Admins can view and manage student registrations
